content: this pattern is featured in a crochet along hosted on my website click here for more information 1 this is an overlay mosaic crochet blanket if you don t know the technique read my tutorial on the blog 2 the full pattern can be purchased here https //juniperandoakes thrivecart com/mosaic-nordic-cal/ ref=ravelrypattern **yarn** wool ease by lion brand affiliate link 3 * linen - 12 skeins * cranberry - 11 skeins **hook** size h/5 0mm i used furls streamline swirl affiliate link 4 1 https //www juniperandoakes com/blog/mosaic-nordic-blanket-cal-free 2 https //www juniperandoakes com/blog/how-to-crochet-overlay-mosaic-patterns 3 http //shrsl com/3qi02 4 http //shrsl com/3qi07
